title: Mercury Transit in the 6th House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When Mercury transits the 6th house for Scorpio Ascendant, thinking becomes practical, problem-solving oriented, and focused on daily responsibilities. Attention turns to work routines, health management, and resolving conflicts through logic. This is a strong phase for analysis, service roles, and handling paperwork or compliance matters. However, overthinking can increase stress or nervous tension. When used consciously, this transit strengthens efficiency, strategic handling of challenges, and mental discipline in day-to-day affairs.
